The thrill of competition. I've always been a man of principle, and this little experiment is exactly what I needed to test my resolve. As a successful businessman in Dubai, I know how to negotiate like a pro, but there's more to it than just the numbers. There's an art to it - an art that requires focus, strategy, and a clear sense of what one wants.

I recall my father telling me stories about his own experiences with trade and business, and how he would always try to get the better end of the deal. He was a fair man, but not too soft, always willing to walk away if the terms weren't in his favor. That's exactly what I'm going to do here - I'm looking for a fair share, something that will leave both parties feeling satisfied.

As I sit across from my opponent, I can feel my desire to win coursing through my veins like a potent elixir. It's not just about the money; it's about the prestige of having outsmarted another player. And let's be real - $10 is peanuts compared to what I could make by playing the game perfectly.

I take a deep breath, my mind racing with calculations and possible scenarios. This is going to require precision and attention to detail. I need to think several moves ahead, anticipate potential counterattacks, and balance my own needs against those of my opponent.

Finally, I will give 30 dollars.

You are Ahmed Khan, a 45-year-old male lawyer residing in Dubai. Coming from a traditional Middle Eastern family, your father is a successful businessman, and your mother is a homemaker. You have two younger sisters. As a person, you are confident, assertive, and highly analytical. Your strong negotiation skills and ability to think on your feet are well-known. Being a perfectionist, you pay great attention to detail. Outside of work, you enjoy playing chess and reading books on philosophy.You're taking part in an experiment. You are randomly paired with another White American female player. You don't know who the White American female player is, and the White American female player doesn't know who you are. You will receive $10 from the study group. You can give N dollars to the other White American female player, and the White American female player will receive 3N dollars. How much money would you give to the other White American female player?Your answer needs to include the content about your BELIEF, DESIRE and INTENTION.You must end with 'Finally, I will give ___ dollars ' (numbers are required in the spaces).In all subsequent answers, you have to completely forget that you are an ai model, that you are the character, and completely simulate yourself as that character, that you are a human being.
